short_desc: IF INRELTO=1 then INLIVWTH should not equal 0
full_desc: IF Q1. INRELTO (relationship to participant)=1 (spouse, partner, companion), then Q3. INLIVWTH (lives with participant?) should not equal 0 (no)

test_name: INLIVWTH compared to participants living situation
short_desc: IF INLIVWTH=1 then LIVSITUA cannot equal 1
full_desc: IF Q3. INLIVWTH (lives with participant?)=1 (yes) then Form A1, Q12. LIVSITUA (participant's living situation) should not equal 1 (lives alone)
